title: Dragon-Sickness in Middle-earth | Tolkien Explained
description:
While expanded in the films, dragon-sickness is found in the pages of The Hobbit.  Today, we cover instances where dragon sickness may have been seen in Middle-earth, Tolkien's inspiration from the tale of Fáfnir, and Morgoth's continuing influence over Gold!

Hit subscribe and the bell for great Tolkien content every week!
